text: David Edward Fuller (July 28, 1941 â€“ February 5, 2022) was an American politician. Fuller was born in Helena, Montana. He was a Democrat. Fuller was in the Montana Senate from 1983 until 1987. Fuller died on February 5, 2022 in East Helena, Montana from problems caused by COVID-19 at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in the United States Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Montana Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Helena, Montana
title: David Fuller (politician)
